channel.description: Recent content in tiny pills on Arturo Source website

item.title: What is an API?
item.description: APIs allow computer programs to communicate with each other. Normally you will use an API (Application Programming Interface) over the HTTP protocol, which is the most common in Internet communications. However, an API is any set of rules that two computer systems follow to communicate. Normally you are not aware that you are consuming an API because you use a library that makes it easier for you. What types of APIs exist?

item.title: What is an Environment Variable?
item.description: What is an environment variable for? How to use it? All in one minute.

item.title: What is a variable?
item.description: The first step to learn programming. How do the programs work inside?
